com.kronostudios.the_game.core

Class UserIG

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kronostudios.the_game.models.User
      • com.kronostudios.the_game.core.UserIG

  • public class UserIG
extends User
    Author:
    mfernandez The UserIG class represents the player in a game. Consists of his chosen build, a list of 3 Cards on his hand, and his deck, with his remaining cards.

      • draw

        public java.util.List<Card> draw()
        Draws cards from the deck and puts in into the players' hand until he has three. Reshuffles the deck every time before drawing from the top of the stack. If the deck is empty, refillsDeck() first.
        Returns:
        List hand;

      • useCard

        public void useCard(Card c)
        Called when executing an action. Removes the card from the current player's hand
        Parameters:
        c - Card
